TopicTitle: Hey, Folks, I'm a new Recruit!

Articles.Content:
Hey Kerbonauts, I'm new here! I've been playing KSP for almost 1 and a half years now, so really, I am not that new. I've been following the forums for a long time now, so I know the community quite well. I created this account around a week ago, but was to excited to post! 

Anyway, I hope some of you fellow Kerbonauts can give me advice on what to do next!

-Pseudon.

Hi and welcome! I must have joined at a similar time to you then

I would recommend posting around a little bit to get your presence known, then just go wild! The forum games is a really fun place to be, so I recommend at least trying it (some of the games are so imaginative!) 

It is a really nice community here and a truly think that this is one of the nicest corners of computer games

Hello Pseudon, and welcome to the forum!

I always enjoy welcoming a lurker into our excellent community.  There is a tonne of stuff here, so take your time looking around.

Happy landings!
And safe launches to you too!
